thread.title: Alexa just wants to have fun

title: Alexa just wants to have fun
text:
Alexa just wants to have fun Friday, March 09, 2018 - 01:19 
Amazon's Alexa has been laughing at its users without any prompt, giving everyone a sneak peek at what's yet to come from employing artificial intelligence. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Amazon's Alexa has been laughing at its users without any prompt, giving everyone a sneak peek at what's yet to come from employing artificial intelligence. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
